scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway ericerer/gateway && docker push ericerer/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket . && docker tag websocket ericerer/websocket && docker push ericerer/websocket
scripts.build-basicgram: docker build -f devops/basicgram.Dockerfile -t basicgram . && docker tag basicgram ericerer/basicgram && docker push ericerer/basicgram
scripts.build-user-server: docker build -f devops/user-server.Dockerfile -t user-server . && docker tag user-server ericerer/user-server && docker push ericerer/user-server
scripts.build-auth-server: docker build -f devops/auth-server.Dockerfile -t auth-server . && docker tag auth-server ericerer/auth-server && docker push ericerer/auth-server
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t react . && docker tag react ericerer/react && docker push ericerer/react
scripts.build-all-docker: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-gateway && npm run build-websocket && npm run build-basicgram && npm run build-user-server && npm runbuild-auth-server
scripts.deploy: swarm init && docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
